product_name: Pearl Izumi Cyclone Gel Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Pearl Izumi Cyclone Gel bike gloves deliver excellent wind and water protection when cycling in cool weather. Soft-shell fabric on back of hands provides superior wind and water protection; fabric quickly wicks moisture and offers excellent stretch for freedom of movement. On the palms, strategically placed gel pads absorb shock, relieving pressure on Ulnar and Median nerves. Soft, durable synthetic leather palms maximize comfort and grip. Gloves are patterned to match the shape of the hand; fit enhances hand-on-handlebar comfort. Soft windproof fabric on the thumb gives you a gentle place to wipe your nose. Rip-and-stick tabs at cuffs close gloves snugly and ease removal. Gauntlet length ensures good coverage over or under jackets. Silicone-screened fingertips enhance grip. Reflective details increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The lightweight Pearl Izumi Cyclone Gel bike gloves deliver excellent wind and water protection when cycling in cool weather.
